Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�

What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Get the Picture.Give Peace a Chance.Two Horn the Savage(pt.1).Two Horn the Savage(pt.2).Moment of Truth.The Prince and the Hopper(pt.1).The Prince and the Hopper(pt.2).The Prince and the Hopper(pt.3).The Prince and the Hopper(pt.4).The Prince and the Hopper(pt.5).1�

Did you find them!?1�
Pro�`fe�`sso�`r!�
Mikilulu! She's-- I've-- It's-- We've-- Toad!1�
Well, if it isn't Salwa-Molwa...1�
and I were just about to set off in search of you.1�
However, it seems that you, in turn, have found us. All's well that ends well, I suppose.1�
Now, why don't you calm down and explain to us what has befallen you...starting with that unfortunate occurrence in Wajaom.1�
You see, you two were still sleeping when I recovered from the spell. I looked around to see if I couldn't spot the fiend that had put us in this predicament...1�
...being turned into a frog!1�
I tried to catch her so you could help break the curse, but for some reason, she started hopping off in the direction of Mamook!�
I knew   would take care of you, Professor, so I left you two there in the woods to chase after Miki.�
(You must have the eyes of a pugil,  . His account of the events is absolutely nothing like what you claim to have seen!)1�
So it was just as you explained,  .1�
Anyway, I tried my best to catch my poor sweetheart, but she was just too slick and slimy.1�
And before I knew it, I found myself in the middle of the forest. Miki had stopped near a tree and I was just about to sneak up and grab her...1�
...when I saw her jump towards a shadow that was probably a terrible monster! It was a Poroggo, I tell you!1�
Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!1�
Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!1�
Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!1�
Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!1�
Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...1�
